thread.title: RR Hamilton
thread.title_full: Thrift Books reviewed by RR Hamilton

author: RR Hamilton
title: RR Hamilton
text: The Shack is one of the best books I have ever read! I read it from the forward to the afterwards. I was so deeply moved by the main character's experiences. I laughed, I cried, I EXPERIENCED his emotions, and just as he did, I came away a better person for having read the book. I have told so many people about it because it really does offer hope in a time when it is so desperately needed. An absolute must read!
